ComicInfo.Summary:
Robyn is on the run for a crime she didn't commit. Who can she trust? Cornered and with nowhere else to turn, she will need to sink to the depths of the city's underground in order to try and clear her name, and may have to get her hands a little dirtier if she hopes to save her friend's life.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Canaan White & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Harvey Tolibao & Grostieta | 2 | C | Cover C | Sabine Rich | 3 | D | Cover D | Riveiro & Mohan Sivakami | 4 | E | Awesome Con Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 250 | Paul Green (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing | F | C2E2 Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 250 | Elias Chatzoudis | Missing | G | C2E2 Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 100 | Elias Chatzoudis | Missing | H | C2E2 Exclusive Foil Variant Cover, Limited to 75 | Elias Chatzoudis | Missing | I | Comics Elite Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 500 | Mirka Andolfo | Missing | J | Subscription Pro Level Foil Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 75 | Eric Basaldua | Missing |
